title: #426 Beaten By Hecklers: A Patreon Mailbag Episode With Robert Kelly
itunes:title: Beaten By Hecklers: A Patreon Mailbag Episode with Robert Kelly
description:
Standup comedian Robert Kelly and standup comedian Ari Shaffir share their plan for world domination in a public Patreon episode. This is the kind of thing I do all the time on Patreon behind the paywall but I didn’t have a podcast for this week. So my lack of responsibility is your win! Congrats for following a degenerate.

Join the Patreon for more content like this!: https://www.patreon.com/arishaffir

#arishaffir #skeptictankpodcast #bobbykelly 

Check out Robert Kelly's Podcast: https://bit.ly/3uifSQG 

Join his Patreon: Patreon.com/RobertKelly for "Live From The Shed" and more! 

Check Dates, Get Merch and More at https://robertkellylive.com/
